vehicles.description: In the rightmost lane ahead, there is a white sedan traveling in the same direction as our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle may slow down or stop, thus it is necessary for this car to maintain a safe following distance.

vehicles.description: The black sedan is located in the far-right lane, traveling in the same direction as our car.
vehicles.explanation: The black sedan may change lanes; our vehicle should be prepared to adjust its position when necessary.

vehicles.description: Several vehicles were traveling in the same direction in the middle lane, one of which was noticeably close to the self-driving vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: These vehicles indicate potential lane changes and require monitoring to adjust speed.

traffic signs.description: The road markings indicate that the lane to the right of the current lane is merging or ending ahead.
traffic signs.explanation: This vehicle should be aware that other vehicles may merge into its lane from the right side.

barriers.description: There are permanent concrete barriers on the right side, which separate the merging lane from the main lane.
barriers.explanation: This obstacle guides the flow of traffic and restricts the vehicle from moving to the right.

barriers.description: The metal guardrail on the left isolates the opposite lanes of traffic.
barriers.explanation: This guardrail ensures that autonomous vehicles stay within their designated lanes and do not deviate into oncoming traffic.

barriers.description: There are concrete barriers on the left side to separate the opposing lanes.
barriers.explanation: Obstacles indicate the direction of traffic flow, signaling that the vehicle should remain in the current lane, as there is no opportunity to make a U-turn or cross over to the opposite side.

other objects.description: After the confluence area, there is a structure similar to a toll booth on the right side of the road.
other objects.explanation: This structure is not on the road, but self-driving vehicles should remain alert to it, in order to prevent any activities around it from affecting the traffic.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image observed, there is a white sedan ahead in the rightmost lane, moving in the same direction as our vehicle. We need to keep a safe following distance as this vehicle could slow down or stop. In addition, a black sedan is spotted in the far-right lane and is also traveling in the same direction as us. Since the black sedan might change lanes, our self-driving vehicle should be ready to adjust its position if necessary. Several other vehicles are present in the middle lane, including one that's notably close to our autonomous vehicle. These vehicles may change lanes, so their movements need to be monitored to adjust speed accordingly.

The traffic image does not contain any vulnerable road users, traffic lights, or traffic cones.

Road markings indicate an upcoming merge or end of the lane to our right, signaling that vehicles may merge into our lane from the right and we should be mindful of this potential movement. There are permanent concrete barriers on the right side, which outline the merging section of the lane and stop us from shifting to the right. A metal guardrail is present on the left side to separate the lanes of opposing traffic, ensuring that we stay within the correct lanes and do not swerve into oncoming traffic. Additionally, concrete barriers are located on the left side as well, indicating a separation from the oncoming traffic lanes and signaling the direction of traffic flow, thus indicating no chance for U-turns or crossing to the opposite side.

After the merge area, there is an edifice resembling a toll booth on the right roadside. Although this structure is not on the carriageway, the self-driving vehicle should stay vigilant to any surrounding activities that might affect the flow of traffic.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe distance from the white sedan ahead, and be cautious of the black sedan on the right that may merge into your lane. Monitor vehicles entering from the merge area on the right. Continue to follow lane markings and abide by road rules, maintaining a constant and appropriate speed. Pay attention to vehicles in the middle lane, and avoid overtaking upon seeing traffic signs. Due to the presence of a police booth, stay alert for any possible instructions from the police.

1.description and explanation: This is a small structure, often referred to as a sentry box, which is typically used for security or surveillance purposes. It is likely placed near a gate or entrance that may require monitoring or controlling access to a particular area. The presence of this structure can indicate that the road might lead to a controlled or restricted area, and the driver of the ego car should be prepared for potential stops or checks by security personnel.

2.description and explanation: This is a passenger car, which looks like it is in motion, partially visible on the right edge of the perspective. The car seems to occupy the right-most lane of the roadway and is positioned in close proximity to the ego vehicle, thereby suggesting that the driver of the ego car should maintain awareness of this vehicle's movements to anticipate any potential lane changes, merges, or other maneuvers that might affect the ego vehicle's driving decisions.
